knimeNode.name: EDF Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node reads in Election Data Format (EDF) from an URL.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads in Election Data Format (EDF) from an URL. In the configuration dialog specify a valid URL and set an optional row prefix. A row ID is generated by the reader in the form 'prefix + rownumber'. If no prefix is specified, the row IDs are just the row numbers.

ports.outPort: The data read from EDF files
